instructions: # Changeling: The Dreaming Character Sheet   **For use in the classic World of Darkness**    Inspired and modified from by Matt Zaldivar's classic World of Darkness Werewolf sheet, with heavy influnce in the brillance of Rich Finder and his Savage World Tabbed sheet. ## Special Areas* All attributes, skills, and so on are fill from the left. * Most buttons also have a template button neaby that uses a roll template for the same roll.**Buttons***A'' Attributes are buttons. * Uncommon Dice pools have normal inline rolls and a roll tmeplate button. * Glamour, Willpower, and Banality are buttons, and only roll the permanent level, also known as the round checkboxes. * The combat tab has a button for each weapon, and a template roll.  * Health boxes are drop down menus.  * If there's something you want added, or you'd like to report a bug, please contact the author of this sheet.    **You will need to load unsafe scripts to see the font.**
